title: Sachin Tendulkar tests positive for novel coronavirus; goes into self-quarantine
summary: Cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar has announced testing positive for COVID-19 through social media. The former Indian cricket captain is currently under home isolation in Mumbai.
content:
Batting legend Sachin Tendulkar has been tested positive for the novel coronavirus. The former India skipper took to social media to confirm the news. The Mumbaikar said that he is currently in home isolation.

Tendulkar made it clear that he is following all necessary protocols as advised by his doctors. The cricket icon has been taking all precautionary measures to combat the virus.
